description:
The 1st day of the swimming lesson! Even Goma-chan looks happy to be swimming in a large pool! Sakata-kun decides to cheat and grabs on Goma-chan’s tail to win the race, but the surprised Goma-chan starts to swim fast! Mr. Tendou tries to help Sakata-kun, but he starts to race Goma-chan instead. Meanwhile, Ashibe-kun and Yuma-kun decides to teach Yumiko-chan and Mao-chan how to swim. Will the two learn how to swim?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Summer! It`s the Pool! It`s Goma-chan!
Natsu Da! Pool Da! Goma-chan Da
夏だ! プールだ! ゴマちゃんだ
